text: Ba jod ored ej mu'minon, on goh ki az dusmanaton ʙa har su megurexted va ʙa hec kase nigoh namekarded va Pajomʙar az pust, sumoro sado mezad, ki nazdi man oed ej ʙandagoni Alloh, ammo ʙa u cavoʙ nadoded. Pas Alloh sumoro dar muqoʙili koraton cazo dod. Ja'ne, ƣame ʙar ƣamaton afzud, ƣame ʙa saʙaʙi az dast dodani piruzi va ƣanimat va ƣame ʙa saʙaʙi sikast xurdanaton va ƣami digar, ki hamai ƣamhoro az jodi sumo ʙarad; (va on, in ʙud, ki xaʙari ʙarduruƣi kusta sudani Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro sunided.)
